sentences.en: Do you also like to eat leek?
European leek cultivated and used like leeks.
sentences.cn: 欧洲一种葱,常象冬葱一样栽培和应用.

sentences.en: European leek naturalized in Great Britain; leaves triangular in section.
sentences.cn: 在英国归化的一种欧洲葱; 叶子呈三角形.

sentences.en: Harvey felt bad when he was obliged to eat the leek.
sentences.cn: 哈维被迫忍受屈辱心里很难受.

sentences.en: He is always confusing wheat with leek.
sentences.cn: 他对麦苗和韭菜总是辨别不清.

sentences.en: Home eat the leek half - moon box.
sentences.cn: 想吃家里 半月形 的韭菜盒子.

sentences.en: In the summer of 1917, he was inspired by the memory of the potato-and-leek soup of his childhood, which his mother and grandmother used to make.
sentences.cn: 1917年夏天，他受到童年时期妈妈和奶奶做过的土豆韭葱汤的启发。

sentences.en: It in not worth a leek.
Leek but from eat together with spinach?
sentences.cn: 韭菜可不可从与菠菜同吃?

sentences.en: Old World leek with a spherical bulb.
sentences.cn: 旧大陆的一种带有球形茎的葱.

sentences.en: Quail and Foie Gras Lollipops with Leek and wild Mushroom Cannelloni.
sentences.cn: 鹌鹑伴鸭润入棒筒搭香韭野菇粉卷.

sentences.en: She had to eat the leek then.
Slice garlic, spring onion, leek and ginger.
sentences.cn: 将蒜头 、 青? 、 青蒜、姜肉切粗丝.

sentences.en: The Celts used these bowls of unleavened bread to hold a variety of fillings, including – as I discover when Wood hands me a sample – a tasty mixture of smoked fish, leek, hazelnuts and cream.
sentences.cn: 凯尔特人用这种未发酵的面包“碗”来放各种各样的食物，我发现伍德今天放的食物就有很多，包括一种烟熏鱼、韭葱、榛子和奶油的混合物。

sentences.en: The son tells: Dig leek, kind towel gourd went.
sentences.cn: 儿子讲: 挖韭菜, 种丝瓜去了.

sentences.en: Wash leek and slice it. Soak in water for 2 hrs. Drain.
sentences.cn: 制法:1.大蒜洗净切片, 用清水浸约2小时, 沥乾水分.

sentences.en: What he said is not worth a leek.

trans.tran_en: a vegetable with a long white stem and long flat green leaves, which tastes like an onion
